pageContext.title: In brief: Mobike to spin off European business as it continues burning money
pageContext.content:
Mobike, the Chinese dockless bike-sharing company, is preparing to spin off its European arm, which it is valuing at US$100 million. According to one industry expert, the lossmaking Mobike was burning US$50m a month earlier this year. Meituan Dianping, which owns Mobike, has no international division of any shape or form and probably doesnâ€™t want one, and when it acquired Mobike it acquired the international arm.

Source: Financial Times
